title: Piston Ring to Groove - Clearance

body.body: Before you remove the rings, check the ring-to-groove clearance of each compression ring.
With the piston rings correctly installed on the piston, check the ring-to-groove clearance of each compression ring, using a feeler gauge.

body.name: Piston Ring to Groove Clearance capg

body.body: When you check the piston ring to groove clearance, always refer to the specifications table (see
If the ring-to-groove clearance is too large, replace the piston rings with a new set.
If the gap remains too large with new piston rings, also replace the piston.
If the gap is too small, check the piston ring grooves closely for distortion and replace the piston if necessary. Do not file the ring grooves.
